messages.title: Fighting for a Better Croydon
messages.content: This election is about the battle for the future of Croydon - a once in a generation chance for real change. Since 2010, our community has been let down. Under the Tories, Croydon families are worse off

keyPolicies.policyDescription: 1,000 extra police on our streets to keep us safe
Genuinely affordable homes to rent and buy
Better healthcare, with a 24/7 GP surgery in central Croydon
More places at good local schools

mentions.candidate: Sarah Jones wants to represent Croydon in Parliament because she loves our area.

issues.economy: Under the Tories, Croydon families are worse off. 1,000 high street shops have closed.
issues.education: More places at good local schools for your children.
issues.health: Better healthcare, with a 24/7 GP surgery in central Croydon.

housing.content: Genuinely affordable homes to rent and buy for local people.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sarah Jones wants to represent Croydon in Parliament because she loves our area.
